reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here over new year and once again had a quiet, very relaxing break. We first came here in January 2007 and try to get back each year for a short break. The cottages have been well maintained and are still like new. The gardens are just beautiful and a credit to Ann and John. Harrietville is a small village at the base of Mt Hotham-an ideal place to base yourself for day trips. Shady Brook is a real gem!
reviews.title: Relaxing and So Quiet!

reviews.text: When u imagine staying in the high country, beautiful country cottage set in beautiful gardens and great facilities - this is what you get! I wish all accommodation was this good! We had a fantastic time but the accommodation was the key!
reviews.title: Absolutely picture perfect , a well kept secret of a great romantic getaway.

reviews.text: Looking for a quiet few days in the North East Victorian highlands we contacted John and Anne Atkins at Shady Brook Cottages. We stayed there for three days and were not disappointed.
reviews.title: Great Highland Getaway Accommodation

likes.liked: — Comfort, quality, taste and attention to detail
likes.disliked: — Two couples but only one double bed bedroom
